text: There’s nothing clever or subtle here, simply our agent disguising themselves through mundane and arcane means into a factor of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:FirstTargetFactionName}} and giving a large gift of precious things to {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetName}} of {{CcoCampaignEventIncident:SecondTargetFactionName}}.
